description: WOODEN Puzzles = Puzzles made of wood, best known for kids. But this robust, natural material isn't just ideal for little hands! If you are looking for a new and unusual puzzle experience, you will love WOODEN Puzzles! The wooden puzzles with sturdy, irregularly shaped pieces require special skill, and they offer an additional highlight: the WHIMSIES – lovingly designed little wooden figures hidden in every WOODEN puzzle. Ravensburger Puzzles mean premium-quality puzzle fun with high standards in terms of materials, motifs, and design. This passion for quality and attention to detail, combined with a huge selection of motifs, formats, and number of pieces, make Ravensburger puzzles so unique and guarantee an unforgettable puzzle experience. From beginners to pros: every puzzle lover will find the perfect puzzle here!
